    • Method Detail

      • isPostInvalid

        public static boolean isPostInvalid​(java.lang.String message)
        This function takes a string and returns true if the string is empty or longer than 100 characters
        Parameters:
        message - The message that the user is trying to post.
        Returns:
        A boolean value.

      • doesItHaveChildrenPost

        public static boolean doesItHaveChildrenPost​(int id)
        It checks if the post has any children posts.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the post
        Returns:
        A boolean value.

      • doesPostIdExist

        public static boolean doesPostIdExist​(int id)
        It loops through the array list of posts and checks if the post id of the post at the current index is equal to the id passed in as a parameter. If it is, it returns true. If it isn't, it returns false
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the post
        Returns:
        A boolean value

      • isAnEndorsement

        public static boolean isAnEndorsement​(int id)
        This function checks if a post is an endorsement by checking if the post is an instance of the Endorsement class
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the post
        Returns:
        The method is returning a boolean value.

        This method returns the number of endorsements a post has

        The number of endorsements.

      • getOriginalPostId

        public int getOriginalPostId()
        This function returns the original post ID of the post (Posts being Endorsements and Comments). If Post id is zero, then it is an original post.
        Returns:
        The original post ID.

      • getTotalPostCount

        public static int getTotalPostCount​(java.lang.String handle)
        This function takes in a string parameter and returns an integer. The integer is the total number of posts that the user has made
        Parameters:
        handle - the account handle of the account you want to get the post count of
        Returns:
        The total number of posts made by a user.

      • getAccountEndorsementTotal

        public static int getAccountEndorsementTotal​(java.lang.String handle)
        This function takes in a string, and returns an integer. The integer is the total number of endorsements for all posts made by the account with the handle that was passed in
        Parameters:
        handle - the account handle of the account you want to get the endorsement total of
        Returns:
        The total number of endorsements for a given account.

      • setPostId

        public void setPostId​(int newPostId)
        This function sets the postId to the newPostId passed.
        Parameters:
        newPostId - The new post ID to set.

        public static void setNumberOfPostsToZero()

      • setHandle

        public void setHandle​(java.lang.String handle)
        This function sets the handle of the user
        Parameters:
        handle - The handle of the user to be followed.

      • setEndorsements

        public void setEndorsements​(int endorsementNumber)
        The function takes in an integer, increments it by one, and then sets the value of the variable numberOfEndorsements to the new value
        Parameters:
        endorsementNumber - The number of endorsements the user has.

      • setNumberOfComments

        public void setNumberOfComments​(int commentNumber)
        This function takes an integer as a parameter and sets the numberOfComments variable to the value of the parameter plus one
        Parameters:
        commentNumber - The number of comments that the post has.

      • setBody

        public void setBody​(java.lang.String body)
        This function sets the body of the post
        Parameters:
        body - The body of the message.
